title: Account transfer
body:
when i can transfer my account ????
some people told me i can in 20/11/ its 21/11 and i cant..

replies.body: Thanks for the info, Frejzen00!  Indeed transfers still appear to be down.  I don't have any updates to offer right now, but I'll be sure to give a heads up when I have info.

I cheked it out because i though it was supposed to be up. And i found a guy which sended a message to Riot support.
made msg to riot support thats what they said
PapaBear (Riot Games Player Support)
Nov 20, 4:24 PM PST
Hey there!
I'm PapaBear from the Account Recovery Support Squad. Sadly, transfers are still down right now. We have some minor repairs that need to be done on our back end before we can open them up, but we will give a notice once they're up and ready to go ^__^
Be sure to check out the League News for any announcements of when transfers are open again.
Let me know if you have any other questions,
Thanks for understanding!
PapaBear
Player Support
Ursine Commander
hi i still cant find it
